variants.name: Elegoo Neptune 0.4 nozzle
variants.startGcode:
M413 S0 ; disable Power Loss Recovery
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
M83 ; extruder relative mode
M104 S120 ; set temporary nozzle temp to prevent oozing during homing and auto bed leveling
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; set final bed temp
G4 S10 ; allow partial nozzle warmup
G28 ; home all axis
;G29 ; run abl mesh
M420 S1 ; load mesh
G1 Z50 F240
G1 X2 Y10 F3000
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; set final nozzle temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp to stabilize
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for nozzle temp to stabilize
G1 Z0.28 F240
G92 E0
G1 Y140 E10 F1500 ; prime the nozzle
G1 X2.3 F5000
G92 E0
G1 Y10 E10 F1200 ; prime the nozzle
G92 E0

variants.name: Elegoo Neptune 2 0.4 nozzle
variants.startGcode:
M413 S0 ; disable Power Loss Recovery
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
M83 ; extruder relative mode
M104 S120 ; set temporary nozzle temp to prevent oozing during homing and auto bed leveling
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; set final bed temp
G4 S10 ; allow partial nozzle warmup
G28 ; home all axis
;G29 ; run abl mesh
M420 S1 ; load mesh
G1 Z50 F240
G1 X2 Y10 F3000
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; set final nozzle temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp to stabilize
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for nozzle temp to stabilize
G1 Z0.28 F240
G92 E0
G1 Y140 E10 F1500 ; prime the nozzle
G1 X2.3 F5000
G92 E0
G1 Y10 E10 F1200 ; prime the nozzle
G92 E0

variants.name: Elegoo Neptune 2D 0.4 nozzle
variants.startGcode:
T[initial_tool] ; set active extruder
M413 S0 ; disable Power Loss Recovery
G90 ; use absolute coordinates
M83 ; extruder relative mode
M140 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; set final bed temp
M104 S150 ; set temporary nozzle temp to prevent oozing during homing and auto bed leveling
G4 S10 ; allow partial nozzle warmup
G28 ; home all axis
;G29 ; auto bed levelling - remove ; at beginning of line to enable
;M420 S1 ; enable mesh - remove ; at beginning of line to enable
G1 Z50 F240
G1 X2 Y10 F3000
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; set final nozzle temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp to stabilize
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for nozzle temp to stabilize
G1 Z0.28 F240 ; move down to prime nozzle
G92 E0 ; reset extruder
G1 E90 ; load filament
G92 E0 ; reset extruder
G1 Y140 E10 F1500 ; prime the nozzle
G1 X2.3 F5000 ; move over for second prime line
G92 E0 ; reset extruder
G1 Y10 E10 F1200 ; prime the nozzle
G92 E0 ; reset extruder

M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp to stabilize
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for nozzle temp to stabilize
G1 Z0.28 F240
G92 E0
G1 Y140 E10 F1500 ; prime the nozzle
G1 X2.3 F5000
G92 E0
G1 Y10 E10 F1200 ; prime the nozzle
G92 E0

variants.name: Elegoo Neptune 4 (0.2 nozzle)
variants.startGcode:
;ELEGOO NEPTUNE 4
M220 S100 ;Set the feed speed to 100%
M221 S100 ;Set the flow rate to 100%
M104 S140
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]
G90
G28 ;home
G1 Z10 F300
G1 X67.5 Y0 F6000
G1 Z0 F300
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer]
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
G1 X67.5 Y0 Z0.4 F300 ;Move to start position
G1 X167.5 E30 F400 ;Draw the first line
G1 Z0.6 F120.0 ;Move to side a little
G1 X162.5 F3000
G92 E0 ;Reset Extruder
variants.endGcode:
;PRINT_END
G91 ;Relative positionning
G1 E-2 F2700 ;Retract a bit
G1 E-8 X5 Y5 Z3 F3000 ;Retract
G90 ;Absolute positionning
G1 X10 Y220 F6000;Finish print
M106 S0 ;Turn-off fan
M104 S0 ;Turn-off hotend
M140 S0 ;Turn-off bed
M84 X Y E ;Disable all steppers but Z

G4 S10 ; allow partial nozzle warmup
G28 ; home all axis
;G29 ; run abl mesh
M420 S1 ; load mesh
G1 Z50 F240
G1 X2 Y10 F3000
M104 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; set final nozzle temp
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single] ; wait for bed temp to stabilize
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for nozzle temp to stabilize
G1 Z0.28 F240
G92 E0
G1 Y140 E10 F1500 ; prime the nozzle
G1 X2.3 F5000
G92 E0
G1 Y10 E10 F1200 ; prime the nozzle
G92 E0
